title: 服务端报错，但是没有崩溃
author: zzgnn1010
txt_content:
我是1.7.10的服务端，之前装了Neverlag，（http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... light=V&page=19）
 设置文件里关掉了1.8防永动机bug，然后开服一段时间后有2个报错如下：

    第一个是全程都有的：
            [12:05:45] [Server thread/ERROR]: "Silently" catching entity tracking error.
net.minecraft.util.ReportedException: Adding entity to track
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTracker.func_72785_a(EntityTracker.java:232) [mn.class:?]
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.EntityRegistry.tryTrackingEntity(EntityRegistry.java:404) [EntityRegistry.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTracker.func_72786_a(EntityTracker.java:62) [mn.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldManager.func_72703_a(WorldManager.java:28) [mp.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72923_a(World.java:1819) [ahb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72923_a(WorldServer.java:1081) [mt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72868_a(World.java:3951) [ahb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.chunk.Chunk.func_76631_c(Chunk.java:1020) [apx.class:?]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage2(ChunkIOProvider.java:50) [ChunkIOProvider.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOProvider.callStage2(ChunkIOProvider.java:15) [ChunkIOProvider.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.util.AsynchronousExecutor$Task.finish(AsynchronousExecutor.java:189) [AsynchronousExecutor$Task.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.util.AsynchronousExecutor.finishActive(AsynchronousExecutor.java:354) [AsynchronousExecutor.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraftforge.common.chunkio.ChunkIOExecutor.tick(ChunkIOExecutor.java:30) [ChunkIOExecutor.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:874) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:430) [lt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:798) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [?:1.7.0_80]
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Entity is already tracked!
        at net.minecraft.entity.EntityTracker.func_72785_a(EntityTracker.java:198) ~[mn.class:?]
        ... 17 more
这个报错看不懂是什么问题……
还有一个报错是这样的：
[11:00:57] [Server thread/ERROR]: Could not pass event BlockPhysicsEvent to NeverLag v1.3.0
org.bukkit.event.EventException
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader$1.execute(JavaPluginLoader.java:338) ~[JavaPluginLoader$1.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.RegisteredListener.callEvent(RegisteredListener.java:62) ~[RegisteredListener.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.fireEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:507) [SimplePluginManager.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.callEvent(SimplePluginManager.java:492) [SimplePluginManager.class:KCauldron-1.7.10-2.1403.1.54]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147460_e(World.java:1079) [ahb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147459_d(World.java:1028) [ahb.class:?]
        at crazypants.enderio.machine.capbank.TileCapBank.setIoMode(TileCapBank.java:286) [TileCapBank.class:?]
        at crazypants.enderio.machine.capbank.TileCapBank.setIoMode(TileCapBank.java:262) [TileCapBank.class:?]
        at crazypants.enderio.machine.capbank.TileCapBank.setDefaultIoMode(TileCapBank.java:293) [TileCapBank.class:?]
        at crazypants.enderio.machine.capbank.TileCapBank.validateDisplayTypes(TileCapBank.java:376) [TileCapBank.class:?]
        at crazypants.enderio.machine.capbank.TileCapBank.func_145845_h(TileCapBank.java:199) [TileCapBank.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:2487) [ahb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.WorldServer.func_72939_s(WorldServer.java:664) [mt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:943) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:430) [lt.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:798) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:658) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [?:1.7.0_80]
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException

jiongjionger大大提到关掉1.8防永动机之后，第二个错误就不会出现，我一直关着，然而还是报错（并没有崩服）
后来我发现他提到了一个capbank，就删掉了游戏里的enderio mod里的capbank方块，第二个错误就不出现了。（不知道为什么会，这个方块放了很久了，一直在用。）

后来我不知道是不是neverlag这个插件导致的第一个报错，就把neverlag换成了clearlag，然而第一个错误还是有，一样的报错。
请教一下各位大大，第一个报错是为何，如何解决，第二个报错为何会错在一个放了很久很久都没问题的的capbank方块上呢？
以上。 谢谢。

replies.author: zzgnn1010
replies.txt_content: 有没有人了解这个问题呢？
